explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the asymmetric interdependence between carbon futures and crude oil futures prices using quantile Granger causality tests and quantile-on-quantile regression methods, along with wavelet decomposition for time-frequency analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or specific neural network techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The methodologies used are statistical and econometric in nature, not involving any machine learning or AI techniques.
